Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Pretreatment of animals with BNPP prior to APAP or PAP administration resulted in marked reduction of APAP ( 900 mg / kg ) nephrotoxicity but not PAP nephrotoxicity .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| BNPP (BNPP, not clear if it's an abbreviation or an acronym) |
| APAP (Acetaminophen, N-acetyl-p-aminophenol) |
| PAP |

Note: The dosage information (900 mg / kg) for APAP is also considered a part of the chemical entity as it specifies the substance being administered.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Chemical" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| BNPP (BNPP) |
| APAP (N-acetyl-p-aminophenol) |

Note: The dosage information (900 mg / kg) for APAP is not considered a separate chemical entity, but rather a part of the administration information for APAP.
